name: Chill Town (itch)
description:
You're a news reporter in a peaceful town full of weird creatures. Annoy them, steal stuff and invade their privacy. Not even their pocket-dimensional houses will protect their personal space from your curiosity! 

WASD + shift + SPACE for movement

F - take pictures for TVs

R - reload if stuck

LClick/RClick - steal stuff from creatures/drop it (Doesn't work smoothly. But hey, if stealing is hard, you get discouraged to do so ¯\_(ツ)_/¯  irl too maybe)

I made this (very first) game for my bachelor's degree in primary-school education project. The research will be about usage of walking simulator type games in idea generation phase of creative writing. I've already tested some walking sims made by other people for this purpose, the kids loved these lessons and wrote some interesting stuff, though for the final project I wanted to learn programming myself and make my own game.
